DOC.brief_summary: The aim study examine effect sleep deprivation muscle recovery maximum eccentric resistance exercise session perform isokinetic dynamometer ( 24 series 10 repetition ) . The sample consist 10 men , sedentary , clinically healthy , age 20 31 year old . Two experimental group develop : EXE-SLEEP , subject perform exercise protocol ( ~18:00-19:00 ) subject normal period sleep 3 night ; EXE-TOTAL , subject perform exercise protocol sleep deprive 60 hour , follow one night sleep rebound .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Sleep Deprivation Blood Hormones Inflammatory Status After Exercise Induced-muscle Damage
DOC.detailed_description: The blood parameter analyze : - Creatine kinase myoglobin : , immediately , 2 , 4 , 12 , 24 , 36 , 48 , 60 hour exercise protocol . - Total free testosterone , IGF-1 , cortisol : , immediately , 2 , 4 , 12 , 24 , 36 , 48 , 60 hour exercise protocol . Moreover , 19:00 second day 19:00 third day collect blood sample every 2 hour . - GH : second night , GH evaluate every 1 hour , 23:00 07:00 . - TNF-alfa , IL-6 , IL-1 beta , IL-10 , IL-1ra : , immediately , 2 hour exercise , well every 4 hour 19:00 second day 19:00 third day . It evaluate isometric strength every 12 hour , well visual analog scale pain .
DOC.criteria: healthy subject sedentary sleep duration 68 hour peer night smoker use vitamin supplement , like C E drink two dos alcohol/day > 4 dose one occasion use antiinflammatory drug antilipidemic drug anemia muscle joint disease cardiovascular disease diabetes renal disease sleep disturbance breathe disorder
